name: fresh-water
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 50 HP.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A mineral water that restores HP by 50 points.
flavor_text.emerald: A mineral water that restores HP by 50 points.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: Water with a high mineral content. It restores the HP of one POKéMON by 50 points.
